content: In which TV series did Captain Jean-Luc Picard and his crew aboard the starship USS Enterprise-D live?

Captain Jean-Luc Picard and his crew aboard the starship USS Enterprise-D lived in the TV series "Star Trek: The Next Generation." The show premiered in 1987 and ran for seven seasons, set in the 24th century. It continued the adventures in the Star Trek universe, exploring themes of morality, politics, and technology through the lens of space exploration.
